Jeffrey Winter wrote:
>  
>> THIS HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH THE CREDIT CARD NUMBER BEING SNIFFED IN
> TRANSIT.
>> THIS IS ABOUT THE CARD NUMBER (or other confidential data) BEING
> VIEWED
>> IN THE BROWSER'S LOCATION BAR LOCALLY.
> 
> Have the server do a redirect on the initial request.  This way you 
> have the ability to perform a GET on the well-known URL, but it wouldn't
> 
> actually appear in the browser's address bar.

Sometimes happens with redirects. Just use a safe identifier.
